description: This may be safer by separating the workers through a transparent wall and minimize handling of used gear.
summary: Behind a plastic wall fitted with glove "sockets" , someone could undress a healthworker on the other side of the wall, dropping gear to be disinfected or burned directly through a chute below. Next the health worker could step through a disinfecting shower  and into a clean room to redress.
title: Use a plastic wall for undressing workers protective gear and disposing of it ?
